title: Profile

about.intro: I'm an easygoing, organised and a self-motivated individual, who likes to develop, design and read. I love programming graphics, or anything closely related to it. I have a reasonable experience as a full stack web developer, and an eye for quality, irrespective of the task at hand. I mostly stick to the computer, but when not, you'll find me reading a novel or playing the guitar.
